Leak GAN.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a new algorithmic framework called Leak GAN to address both the non-informativeness and the sparsity issues .

LeakGAN.from sentence: LeakGAN is a new way of providing richer information from the discriminator to the generator by borrowing the recent advances in hierarchical reinforcement learning .
